rules_text:
Create a 2/2 red and white Human Monk creature token and two 1/1 colorless Orb artifact creature tokens.
Creatures you control gain flying and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“Just as I thought it strange the night still hasn't ended... I find [/i]you,[i] Marisa.”[/i]
